page.title: 03JACKSOMS FARM DOWN FARM
page.content: { JACKSOMS FARM}IS 2.5 KM NORTH EAST OF CHIPPENHAM . THE FARMERS NAME IS {MR GRIFFIN}. HE IS A MIXED FARMER HE HAS GOT 200{FRESIANS}AND GROWS OATS AND BARLEY WHICH ARE USED ON THE FARM OR SOLD . THEY HAVE GOT{400 ACRES}THE FARM WAS BUILT IN 1600 . THEY TAKE THEIR COWS TO MARKET AT{CHIPPENHAM}.HE HAS BEEN A FARMER FOR ALL HIS LIFE . HE HAS{8 HELPERS . {DOWN FARM {DOWN FARM}IS 2.5 KM NORTH WEST FROM CHIPPENHAM FARMER MILLS GROWS WHEAT . THE FARM IS 110 ACRES . THE FARM HOUSE HAS BEEN THERE FOR{400 YEARS . MR MILLS SENDS HIS ANIMALS TO MARKET AT CHIPPENHAM . MR MILLS HAS BEEN A FARMER FOR 25 YEARS HE HAS NO FARM HANDS .
